Sentencas: The possibility to stabilize the delta-Bi2O3-type polymorph with high ionic conductivity by doping with Tm2O3 was investigated in this study.
Titulo: A new electrolyte based on Tm3+-doped δ-Bi2O3-type phase with enhanced conductivity

Sentencas: Five microaystalline samples were synthesized at 750 degrees C from alpha-Bi2O3 and Tm2O3 mixtures with compositions (Bi1-xTmx)(2)O-3, where x = 0.04, 0.08, 0.11, 0.14 and 0.20.
Titulo: A new electrolyte based on Tm3+-doped δ-Bi2O3-type phase with enhanced conductivity

Sentencas: The XRD, SEM, HRTEM and SAED results showed that the targeted delta-Bi2O3-type single-phase (space group Fm (3) over barm) was formed for 0.11 <= x <= 0.20.
Titulo: A new electrolyte based on Tm3+-doped δ-Bi2O3-type phase with enhanced conductivity

Sentencas: The unit cell parameter of delta-Bi2O3-type phase decreases with increase in Tm content.
Titulo: A new electrolyte based on Tm3+-doped δ-Bi2O3-type phase with enhanced conductivity

Sentencas: According to DTA, no phase transitions were observed in the sample with x = 020, indicating that the obtained delta-Bi2O3-type phase is structurally stable from room temperature to 985 degrees C. Based on EIS, (Bi0.80Tm0.20)(2)O-3 exhibits high conductivity (0.117 S cm(-1) at 550 degrees C) with activation energies: 0.38(4) eV above 550 degrees C and 127(2) eV below 550 degrees C, due to the change in charge carrier mobility.
Titulo: A new electrolyte based on Tm3+-doped δ-Bi2O3-type phase with enhanced conductivity

Sentencas: The effect of thermal aging was investigated and discussed.
Titulo: A new electrolyte based on Tm3+-doped δ-Bi2O3-type phase with enhanced conductivity
A new electrolyte based on Tm3+-doped δ-Bi2O3-type phase with enhanced conductivity
